examples.korean: ‘Pass away’ is a euphemism for ‘die’. 듣기 Add to Wordbook pass away는 die의 완곡어이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: In ‘Go away!’ the verb is in the imperative. 듣기 Add to Wordbook Go away!에서는 동사가 명령법으로 쓰였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
